title: Ticket #2106: HAD and HIBERNATE don't play nice together
description:
When a machine goes into hibernate state, it seems that the startd sends UPDATE_STARTD_AD_WITH_ACK only to one collector, even if multiple are specified (e.g. when using HAD) by the COLLECTOR_LIST.

The plan is a patch that sends the update atomically w/ ack to all collectors, and fails if any collector in the list does not ack. So if the offline state notification does not make it to all collectors, the startd will not hibernate.
